Uses of Interface
org.yamcs.security.AuthenticationToken

  • Packages that use AuthenticationToken 
    Package Description
    org.yamcs.security  

    • Uses of AuthenticationToken in org.yamcs.security

      Classes in org.yamcs.security that implement AuthenticationToken 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ApplicationCredentials
      Credentials for identifying as an application, for example the singleton application that represents a service account.
      class  ThirdPartyAuthorizationCode
      Represents a token (or 'authorization_code' in oauth terms) issued by an external identity server.
      class  UsernamePasswordToken
      A token using to login as a standard user with a password.
